name: Hoop Run - Basketball on Fire
description:
Pull the Hoop & Shoot the ball! Ridiculously fun game that's easy to play yet hard to master! How many shots can you make in a row?!

Game Features:
- Non-stop ball-shooting action with realistic physics!
- Collect stars & unlock 51 unique balls!
- Keep on shooting and discover unique themes!
- Amazing animations & unique trail for each ball!
- Score higher with Fever Mode & Roof Bounce!

How many shots can you make?!
